nodes.text: we must husband it's use far more than we presently do.
We ought to use alternatives to oil whenever feasible.
We are not currently using alernatives to oil whenever feasible.
If we ought to do something whenever we can and we are not doing it we ought to do it more than we do.
If an energy resource is not renewable in anything like the normal span of a human life we ought to use other resources whenever feasible.
oil is not renewable in the normal span of a human life. It takes a zillion years and a lot of dinosaurs to make the stuff.
